snippet: President Thein Sein declared a state of emergency in the eastern region of Kokang and imposed a three-month period of martial law there on Tuesday night.
abstract: Myanmar Pres Thein Sein, reacting to deadly fighting between army and ethnic Kokang force Myanmar National Democratic Alliance Army, declares state of emergency and imposes martial law in eastern Kokang; since violence began in early February, civilians are fleeing to China raising concerns about influx of refugees there.
lead_paragraph: President Thein Sein declared a state of emergency in the eastern region of Kokang and imposed a three-month period of martial law there on Tuesday night.

headline.main: Myanmar: Martial Law Imposed in Area Near China
headline.print_headline: Myanmar: Martial Law Imposed in Area Near China
